title: If you dont like it just ignore it but if you are ok with it, this is an animu/waifu thread!!
body:
Oh Re:Zero, this is the most japanese episode ever, hunting whales

http://i.imgur.com/gAQKfmb.png

but it was actually a good episodes with a few wtf moments while they were trying to subdue our lovely magical Moby Dick

http://i.imgur.com/srLY3D0.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/9u0956M.png

Rejoice cause today they didnt make Rem look like best waifu...then again they only did something like

http://i.imgur.com/ti7tpNc.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/KHjszqM.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/yCgoRQV.png

Crusch is strong af but didnt have any protagonism tbh, the Old guy went full action master anti gravity  nursing home knight , guy "is" cool tho and has good taste, cheers



http://i.imgur.com/QG687Da.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/x7IlgY2.jpg

Ok so spoiler free as...well not as always but if you read the comments you might find a fucking lot of spoilers well maybe not, it all depends on everyone's mood and stuff, and putting that aside, i must say that Crusch looks way better on the mango

http://i.imgur.com/z9Khf8y.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/0twqfEA.png

http://i.imgur.com/5M9AyTy.png?1

and from now on i need to start uploading more images for the thread cause reasons but putting that aside i have a random Rem "song" and a regular non rem one 


Rem one might trigger some people tho, why? because lip sync

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJLJwyh3mGM

and the "random" songggggg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EoFhVwKzzRk
